content: body 4 stitches apart at the front photo k sew the ears onto either side of the head between rounds 3 & 4 photo l nose m n in black sew a strand of black yarn around the the centre stitch of rounds 8 & 9 between the eyes secure the ends inside the head photo m cheeks make 2 o p in cranberry 1 5 single_crochet into magic_ring 5 slip_stitch fasten_off and sew between rounds 9 & 11 slightly behind the eyes photo n tail * leave a long tail at the beginning to sew onto body in yellow 1 chain 6 2 starting 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet 5 5 chain 1 & turn 3 single_crochet 5 5 chain 1 & turn 4 single_crochet 2 2 chain 1 & turn 5 single_crochet 2 chain 4 6 turn 6 starting 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet 5 5 chain 1 & turn 7 single_crochet 5 5 chain 1 & turn 8 single_crochet 5 fasten_off and sew between rounds 7 & 8 at a slight angle photo o & p @ 2024 willow&wild all rights reserved
